alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 10:19PM CDT until July 20 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT/1115 PM CDT/ FOR WICHITA AND EASTERN GREELEY COUNTIES... At 919 PM MDT/1019 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Tribune, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...The Automated Weather Observing Site in Tribune measured a 64 mph gust at 911 PM MDT/1011 PM CDT/. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Leoti, Tribune, Horace, Lydia, Selkirk and Marienthal. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
